thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Jaime Lee
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Jaime Lee

author: Jaime Lee
title: Jaime Lee
text: I've used FramesDirect a couple of times now. They really stand behind their price-match policy and are prompt and professional. I did some research and found out that a number of other glasses sites are just plain ripoffs. FramesDirect is not; they provide solid service and I appreciate that, which Is why I'm taking the time to write this review.
